Hi, welcome to the forum, the possibilities of dry mouth are inadequate water intake, anxiety, hot climate etc. Other important causes are Sjögren's syndrome, Amyloidosis, Sarcoidosis, HIV infection (unlikely) and uncontrolled diabetes mellitus.You need to under go investigations like blood sugar, salivary mucin content, HIV ELIZA, chest radiograph to rule out the causes. Maintain good oral hygiene. Drugs like Pilocarpine or Cevimeline, which prevents dry mouth, should only be taken after consultation from physician. Take care and regards.
